63.1: Psalm 63A psalm of David. When he was in the Desert of Judah.O God, you are my God,earnestly I seek you;my soul thirsts for you,my body longs for you,in a dry and weary landwhere there is no water.

63.8: My soul clings to you;your right hand upholds me.
